trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.ManipulationInertiaStarting"> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs object to specify the inertial behavior of a manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar o objeto de ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs para especificar o comportamento de um manipulação inertial.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the inertial behavior for each type of manipulation separately by using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode especificar o comportamento inertial para cada tipo de manipulação separadamente utilizando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.RotationBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.ExpansionBehavior%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs.TranslationBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each property is a type of object that represents the inertial behavior and in each case, you can specify the following: - The initial velocity of the inertia when it begins.
trans-unit.target: Cada propriedade é um tipo de objeto que representa o comportamento inertial e em cada caso, pode especificar o seguinte:-a velocidade de inicial de inércia se quando começa.

trans-unit.source: - The desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends.
trans-unit.target: -A posição pretendida da manipulação quando inércia se termina.

trans-unit.source: - The desired deceleration of the inertia.
trans-unit.target: -O deceleration pretendido de inércia se.

trans-unit.source: You typically specify either the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends or the desired deceleration of the inertia, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, especifique a posição pretendida da manipulação quando termina de inércia se ou a deceleration pretendido de inércia se, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Cancels the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Cancela a manipulação.

trans-unit.source: If the method succeeds, the default <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice> sends previous touch events as mouse down, mouse move, or mouse up events to the element and future manipulation events do not occur.
trans-unit.target: Se o método for bem sucedida, a predefinição <xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>envia anterior touch eventos como rato para baixo a movimentação do rato ou rato para cima eventos para o elemento e eventos de manipulação de futuras não ocorrer.</xref:System.Windows.Input.TouchDevice>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the manipulation was successfully canceled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a manipulação com êxito foi cancelada; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: Obter ou define a taxa de slowdown de movimento inertial de expansão.

trans-unit.source: Use the ExpansionBehavior property to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de ExpansionBehavior fazer o seguinte:-Especifique a velocidade de inércia se inicial quando começa definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired expansion of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique a expansão pretendida da manipulação quando termina de inércia se definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique o deceleration pretendido de inércia se definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, mas não ambos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaExpansionBehavior.DesiredExpansion%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de uma aplicação que responde a manipulações, consulte [instruções: criar a primeira Touch aplicação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of expansion inertial movement
trans-unit.target: A taxa de slowdown de movimento inertial de expansão

trans-unit.source: Gets the rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as taxas de alterações para a manipulação que ocorre antes de inércia se inicia.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de uma aplicação que responde a manipulações, consulte [instruções: criar a primeira Touch aplicação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rates of changes to the manipulation that occur before inertia starts.
trans-unit.target: As taxas de alterações para a manipulação que ocorre antes de inércia se inicia.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the container that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*> property is relative to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o contentor que a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>propriedade é relativa.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de uma aplicação que responde a manipulações, consulte [instruções: criar a primeira Touch aplicação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The container that the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*> property is relative to.
trans-unit.target: O contentor que a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>propriedade é relativa.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationStartedEventArgs.ManipulationOrigin*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ponto a partir da qual a manipulação teve origem.

trans-unit.source: If more than one point of contact initiated the manipulation, the ManipulationOrigin property is the point between all of the points of contact.
trans-unit.target: Se mais do que um ponto de contacto iniciada a manipulação, a propriedade ManipulationOrigin é o ponto entre todos os pontos de contacto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de uma aplicação que responde a manipulações, consulte [instruções: criar a primeira Touch aplicação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The point from which the manipulation originated.
trans-unit.target: O ponto a partir da qual a manipulação teve origem.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de objetos que representa o contacta o touch para o manipulação.

trans-unit.source: A collection of objects that represents the touch contacts for the manipulation.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos que representa o contacta o touch para o manipulação.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a taxa de slowdown de movimento inertial rotacional.

trans-unit.source: Use the RotationBehavior property to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de RotationBehavior fazer o seguinte:-Especifique a velocidade de inércia se inicial quando começa definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique a rotação pretendida da manipulação quando termina de inércia se definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique o deceleration pretendido de inércia se definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, mas não ambos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaRotationBehavior.DesiredRotation%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo de uma aplicação que responde a manipulações, consulte [instruções: criar a primeira Touch aplicação](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of rotational inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: A taxa de slowdown de movimento inertial rotacional.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o comportamento de um manipulação durante inércia se.

trans-unit.source: You typically do not need to call this method.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, não tem de chamar este método.

trans-unit.source: Use the properties on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs> instead.
trans-unit.target: Utilize as propriedades no <xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>em vez disso.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ManipulationInertiaStartingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that specifies the behavior of a manipulation during inertia.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que especifica o comportamento de um manipulação durante inércia se.

trans-unit.source: parameter is .
trans-unit.target: parameteris .

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: Obtém e define a taxa de slowdown de movimento inertial linear.

trans-unit.source: Use the TranslationBehavior property to do the following: - Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de TranslationBehavior fazer o seguinte:-Especifique a velocidade de inércia se inicial quando começa definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.InitialVelocity%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired position of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique a posição pretendida da manipulação quando termina de inércia se definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: -Especifique o deceleration pretendido de inércia se definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>

trans-unit.source: You typically set either the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A> or the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A>, mas não ambos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDeceleration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InertiaTranslationBehavior.DesiredDisplacement%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre manipulações, consulte o [descrição geral de entrada](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The rate of slowdown of linear inertial movement.
trans-unit.target: A taxa de slowdown de movimento inertial linear.
